Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money!
Reviews.Author: carol
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice tv, and I got it at a very good price.  At first I didn't think the picture was very clear, but then I exchanged my old cable box for an HDTV cable box (free exchange at the cable company).  Now the picture is amazingly bright and clear.  I adjusted the color a bit, and it's perfect!

Reviews.Title: A great mid-size LED
Reviews.Author: vifmxol
Reviews.Content: Good picture, PC imput, low power consumption, seems good to me, I don't have problems with the remote. I give it 4 stars instead of 5 because it's a little slower changing channels than I would like it to be. Sound seems good.

Reviews.Title: Good picture and price
Reviews.Author: todd
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these about a month ago and was so pleased that I bought another one a few days ago.  Shipping was prompt (as expected with Amazon) and both tv's came in perfect mechanical and cosmetic shape.Another reviewer talked about the picture turning brown or red - I have never experienced this; I find the picture and sound to be pretty good.

Reviews.Title: 32L2200U 32-inch
Reviews.Author: knives
Reviews.Content: Nice TV for the bedroom. My wife didn't want anything bigger. She's the one that uses a TV in the bedroom, now I can't get her out of it, (Not all bad)

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture and Easy to Operate
Reviews.Author: Keith P.
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because I had a size limitation inside a cabinet. Most of the big named TV manufacture’s had a physically larger size that this Toshiba 32L2200U TV. Granted I was unsure of Toshiba brand but I was limited in my choices. I have been very satisfied in the operation and the picture quality. This TV even surprised me by automatically changing the input source from cable to video when my DVD player starts.

Reviews.Title: Cheap but good
Reviews.Author: jmichaelss "jsramek"
Reviews.Content: For the price, a nice TV. Perfectly functional and easy to adjust color settings. It has audio outputs so you can hook it up to the stereo for better sound. The remote is easy to use (not backlit unfortunately), with the "input" button right on top, so you can switch back and forth between TV, Roku, DVD, etc. My only complaint is that you have to reset the picture size every time you change input type. If your expectations are high, I'd recommend something fancier; if you just want to watch Hulu or Netflix, this TV will do just fine.

Reviews.Title: It's an LED TV
Reviews.Author: Gr8shoes "Toots"
Reviews.Content: Picture is clear, it hooked up quickly & easily to my AppleTV .  I erred in assuming it had a built in HDTuner since most teevees do these days, and have not found a decent antenna to pull in the signal yet, but I have AppleTV and so Netflix Hulu Plus and Aereo can all be broadcast via it.  It is a decent tv for a decent price. nothing to write home about, it's a television

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Brown "robjbrown"
Reviews.Content: My first Toshiba tv and I was pleasantly surprised.  The sound is very good and the picture quality is great.  The advertising stated that this tv has an ear phone jack but it does not have one.

Reviews.Title: Not my first Toshiba
Reviews.Author: Earl Slick2
Reviews.Content: I have been a Toshiba customer for about twenty some years, now.  I have never had a Toshiba TV that I didn't just love, really.  They have always outlasted my residencies and the picture and functionality is great.  I like how the mute button cuts the volume in half, and then on the second push, all the way.The only draw back this model could have, is that it only has 2 HDMI ports.  Mom's VISIO has like, 5.It is a bedroom TV that I have hooked up to a Tivo HD DVR and it works as good as the TV I gave to my neighbor when I moved.  (He LOVES my "old" Toshiba, by the way.)  Also, the delivery time was VERY fast from the vendor AND Amazon.  Go man, go.

Reviews.Title: Just okay
Reviews.Author: Olivia
Reviews.Content: I was told Toshiba was a pretty good brand, but I don't love it. Sometimes the remote acts funny and I have to get closer to the television for the remote to actually work. Also the reaction from the remote is a little delayed for example it takes about 10 seconds for the tv to power on.

Reviews.Title: As wish
Reviews.Author: ChrisK
Reviews.Content: Toshiba is a great TV manufacturer, The tv works great, looks great, is very light, I'm completely satisfied with my product.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Ramon Perez
Reviews.Content: excelente equipo, muy buena resolucion, lo recomiendo ampliamente para todas aquellas personal que quieran tener una experiencia real en las peliculas que esten disfrutando.

Reviews.Title: love the tv
Reviews.Author: Mario
Reviews.Content: I acqurie this for  a replacement for my monitor. The old monitor started 'flickering". It would last hours sometimes. Now I can watch cabel and switch to computer!!!!!! I had problem with the icons being too big. I figured out it was easy to fix by adjusting the zoom. Overall it's good  flat screen and LCD!!!

Reviews.Title: Out of focus
Reviews.Author: Swede S
Reviews.Content: A terrible quality picture.  Returned it for a Samsung 32" and was glad I did.  Samsung worked great out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: MM
Reviews.Content: The only thing I don't like about this TV is that it takes a few seconds for the TV to turn on since hitting ON button. I don't know if that's a standard thing, but it's kind of annoying. Once it's on, it works great. Very light too.

Reviews.Title: Should have looked at reviews
Reviews.Author: Buyalot "Love quality"
Reviews.Content: I bought this on Toshiba reputation alone.Pros: low cost,energy star ,light weightCons: Picture turns a odd reddish on various scenes, If you want to use an off air antenna you better have a really good one with an amplifier. This replaced a old Sony CRT type and the color is just not as good.My advice is look for something else.

Reviews.Title: tv is not working!!
Reviews.Author: April Rose Rosal
Reviews.Content: it doesnt work no power!!!! i cant use it!!! how can i use this tv if there is no power????

ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba 32L2200U 32-Inch LED-lit 60Hz TV
